setting.name: CHEAT_TELEPORT
setting.description: What to do when we detect a player using a cheat. 0=Do nothing, 1=Console warn, 2=Kick, 3=Ban

setting.name: CHEAT_GODMODE
setting.description: What to do when we detect a player using a cheat. 0=Do nothing, 1=Console warn, 2=Kick, 3=Ban

setting.name: CHEAT_AIRBREAK
setting.description: What to do when we detect a player using a cheat. 0=Do nothing, 1=Console warn, 2=Kick, 3=Ban
